The photo was published on Facebook on J: 2019, and has been shared more than 5,700 times.
The post: s Hindi-language caption translated to English as: "In Jaora city in the state of Madhya Pradesh, a child-lifter gang of 25 people has been busted by the police. Send it to all the contacts in your phone and in all groups so that everyone remains cautious and no child is kidnapped."
The photo was shared with a similar clai: 4. The claim was proven false by media reports and local police, who stated that the people pictured were involved in a prostitution racket, not child kidnapping.
